alert.note: Alert for Clark (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 7:04PM CDT until August 11 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN CLARK COUNTY... At 704 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Shortville, or 9 miles east of Neillsville, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported 55 mph winds near Spencer at 655 pm. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Clark County, including the following locations... Chili, Hog Corners, Ballard Road And Pray Avenue, Highway 73 And 98, Chili Corners, Tioga and Christie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
